name: @maquestiaux-devs/multitech-cli
description: This tool will help you create projects based on your selected category and technology.

scripts.release:alpha: standard-version --prerelease alpha && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --tag alpha --access=public
scripts.release:preminor: standard-version --prerelease preminor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --tag alpha --access=public
scripts.release:premajor: standard-version --prerelease premajor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --tag alpha --access=public
scripts.release:patch: standard-version --release-as patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release:minor: standard-version --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access=public
scripts.release:major: standard-version --release-as major && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access=public
